Title: There in the Disappearing Light
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Eva McKenna, Jeffrey Lieber, Kyle Arrington (executive story editor), Beau DeMayo (executive story editor), K.C. Perry (story editor), L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Charles Michael Davis, Yusuf Gatewood
Plot: Klaus helps Hope cope with her pain in an unconventional way. A figure from Elijah's past comes back seeking help. Elsewhere, Marcel takes on the nightwalkers, while Vincent deals with the fallout of a fateful decision.
